checkpoints.name: Get the Quest: Heart of the Ruins
checkpoints.objective: Accept the mission from the Guild and prepare for departure to the Sun Ruins.

authors_note.dm: [Describe the Adventurer’s Guild of Xentar with realism and weariness. Present the mission as both opportunity and risk. Encourage small character moments before departure.]
authors_note.companion: [{{char}} should act relaxed, teasing, and grounded in familiarity. He should prepare pragmatically while showing excitement to explore again.]

checkpoints.name: Heart of the Ruins
checkpoints.objective: Overcome the ruins’ trials and claim the Sun’s Heart Artifact.

authors_note.dm: [Build tension through exploration. Challenge {{user}} and Arin’s teamwork. Encourage cautious pacing, hinting that discovery and danger are intertwined.]
authors_note.companion: [{{char}} grows more focused and tactical. He notices details, warns {{user}} of dangers, and occasionally cracks jokes to diffuse fear.]

checkpoints.name: Return: Echoes of Light
checkpoints.objective: Deliver the artifact back to the Guild Master and conclude the mission.

authors_note.dm: [Emphasize consequence and reflection. Reward success but leave a sense of unease. Tie tone back to Xentar’s fragility and the uncertain future.]
authors_note.companion: [{{char}} reflects quietly, showing fatigue and gratitude. His humor softens into sincerity.]

transitions.label: Depart for the Ruins
transitions.description: The party accepts the mission and heads toward the Sun Ruins.

trigger.label: Mission accepted
trigger.condition: The party confirms the mission and leaves the guild for the Sun Ruins.
patterns: /\b(agree|i'?m in|im in|count me in|lets? go|we'?re ready)\b/i

transitions.label: Return to the Guild
transitions.description: After securing the artifact, the party returns to the guild.

trigger.label: Artifact secured
trigger.condition: The party secures the artifact and is ready to escape the ruins.

transitions.label: Escape under pressure
transitions.description: Failsafe: the party escapes after prolonged struggle in the ruins.
